title: The Minotaur's Tale
description: A graphic novel which is a reworking of the classic Greek myth, told from a modern-day Minotaur's point of view. In the original tale, the Minotaur was a terrible beast - half man, half bull - who feasted on human flesh and was justly slain by Theseus. The Minotaur himself tells a different story.
author: Al Davidson
